nodes.text: The Third Sun Cantina, also known as the Mos Taike Tavern, was a cantina run by the Bith D'Mayna Stallaphalat (aka Stella) in the town of Mos Taike on the planet Tatooine. Stella became a favorite with all the locals, and got to know everyone in the town, and they all came to her cantina. She even allowed Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives into her bar.
In 1 ABY, Jabba Desilijic Tiure took interst in her business, but she eventually convinced him to leave her alone.
